intro:
A Hidden Planet. A New Hope.
Explore, build, and survive in the mysterious world of Planet IX.
description:
Discover a mysterious new planet that challenges everything we thought we knew about the universe. Hidden for ages behind the Sun, this twin of Earth has finally been revealed thanks to groundbreaking technology. Sharing the same habitable zone, day-night cycle, and even the same mass as Earth, Planet IX (known to its native inhabitants as Lunara) represents a bold new frontier for humanity.

While scientists were exploring this incredible world and teaching the Lunarians to speak our language, disaster struck Earth. The Moon was mysteriously destroyed. With debris threatening all life on the planet, the research team rushed back to help the survivors, leaving behind Emylia, a dedicated civil engineer. With the help of an advanced AI, Emylia takes on the mission to build a safe colony for Earth’s last remaining survivors.

  Build and Decorate
Construct essential structures such as schools, power plants, homes, and hospitals.
Design and decorate both the interior and exterior of homes any way you like.

  Mining & Crafting
Gather wood, mine materials, and craft crucial tools and items for survival and colony expansion.

  Farming
Grow food to sustain your colony and support its growth.

  Combat
Fight off monsters and explore mines and dungeons known as the Ancient Labyrinth.

  RPG System
Level up attributes such as Attack, Defense, Critical Chance, and Luck to strengthen your character.

  Technology & Theme
A unique blend of futuristic technology and medieval-inspired elements.

  Day-Night & Weather Cycle
Experience dynamic weather, seasons, and time progression throughout the game.

  Oxygen Management
Oxygen is consumed over time — fail to replenish it and you’ll lose random items and consciousness.

  Lunarian Interaction
Trade goods in the Lunarian Valley, located northwest of the colony.

  Taming System
Tame wild animals and ancient robots to assist in tasks and battle.
